name: Rotten Island V1.2
description:
Rotten Island - A Game for WGJ 27

Rotten Island took inspiration from old arcade shooters. 

Instructions
  • ENTER - Start the Game
  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • LMB - Shoot
  • TELL US YOUR BEST KILL COUNT IN THE COMMENTS!
CREDITS
  • Music by ZeroPointCrossing
  • Title font : https://www.1001freefonts.com/this-night.font
  • Gun shot sfx : https://audiojungle.net
Change-log Version 1.2
  • Post-Processing
  • Gun recoil animation
  • Increasing spawn rate (AKA difficulty now present)
  • Other minor changes/fixes
Version 1.1
  • Zombie walk anims
  • Rate of fire added
  • Health indicator
  • Kill count
Get The Assets!
